alert.note: Alert for Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Wharton, southwestern Brazoria and north central Matagorda Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sweeny, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bay City, Sweeny, Van Vleck and southwestern Wild Peach Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
